label: Behavior 12021310
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the persistent small differences between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and gradual course evolution, suggest the vessel is navigating a predefined curved channel or coastal bend; position progression follows an approximately linear trajectory in geographic coordinates with slight northeasterly curvature, modeled by a second-order polynomial: lat(t) ≈ 55.9251 - 0.0048 × t + 0.0002 × t², lon(t) ≈ 15.5849 + 0.0152 × t + 0.0007 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
